item.description:
If you are not crazy enough to get up at 8am for the BAA 5k pre Boston Marathon race come and join us at the more leisurely time of 11am . Run out your Pre Race jitters around beautiful castle Island ..have a chat and gentle warm up before the big day ...and if you are not running the Marathon all the more reason to come and hang out and tell us how crazy we are!!! Planning to run 3-5 miles...
Refreshments will be provided from Charley's Trunk aka as "boot" afterwards.....
Donations for refreshments will be greatly received for our Marathon Charity....www.dlc-ma.org
Lookin forward to seeing you there!!
item.how_to_find_us: Will be next to Charley's white RAV4 Call my cell 520-603-5236 if you get lost.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Pre Boston Marathon Warm up at Castle Island!!
